import React from "react"; import "./Novalty.css"; import Header1 from "../components/Header1"; export default function NoveltyReplicaCoinsPolicy() { return (
{/* ===== Banner Section ===== */}
WhatNew / Safety & Policy /{"General "}

Novelty or Replica Coins Policy

WhatNew Support February 10, 2025 at 8:46 PM

{/* ===== Novelty & Replica Coins Policy Section ===== */}

WhatNew does not permit the sale of counterfeit, fake, or forged coins. However, sellers may sell replica coins where the seller is clear in the relevant listing or livestream that the coin is a novelty, replica, or non-legal tender.

In addition, the coin itself must be easily discernible as a novelty, replica, or non-legal tender. For example:

  • Marking: The coin is physically marked to indicate it is a novelty, replica, or non-legal tender.
  • Denomination & Weight: The coin omits the legal tender denomination.
  • Appearance: The coin has artwork, color, and/or size that is clearly marked to distinguish it from circulated coins.
{/* ===== Policies Section ===== */}

Articles in this section

Surprise Products Policy Card Breaks Policy Mondial Proof of Drop-off Novelty or Replica Coins Policy WhatNew Food & Drink Policy WhatNew Seller Protection Policy
); }
